Graduating my Fourth Class: Advanced SE

Aug 17, 2015 â€¢ Jamie Pilgrim

After eight weeks of teaching and getting to know some incredible kids, I have ended my summer teaching fellowship with Flatiron School.



Getting Advanced






Upping the Game






Hanging with the Big Devs

Class field trip down to Braintree's Chicago HQ.









The Final Finals








Learned. Loved. Coded.

Learned




Loved




Coded






It is surreal sitting here on my couch at home, on a Monday, when I would normally be welcoming a new class. Instead, I am sending my resume and working on code challenges.




I'm not 100% sure what my next steps are, but I am making plans to keep teaching alongside developing.
